text: Wilbur Vernon "Sandy" Brotherton (July 6, 1922 â€“ January 15, 2021) was an American politician. He was a member of the Michigan House of Representatives from 1975 to 1988. Brotherton was born in Chicago, Illinois. He was a member of the Republican Party. Brotherton died on January 15, 2021 in Farmington Hills, Michigan at the age of 98.Wilbur V.
